function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Influence of confinement on green spaces perception","Impact":"Misjudgment of the value of green spaces leading to inadequate planning and design of green infrastructure","Mitigation":"Conduct research to understand the true impact of confinement on green spaces perception and use the findings to inform green infrastructure planning","Technologies":"Social research methods, survey tools","People":"Urban planners, landscape architects, policymakers","Owner":"Research organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Statistically significant predictors for WTP of a larger green roof","Impact":"Incorrect assessment of factors influencing willingness to pay for a larger green roof leading to misallocation of resources","Mitigation":"Conduct further analysis to validate the significance of predictors and consider other relevant variables","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools, regression modeling","People":"Policy analysts, urban planners, environmental economists","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Statistically aggregated variables to reduce categories","Impact":"Loss of granularity in understanding the relationship between variables and willingness to pay for green roofs","Mitigation":"Use alternative statistical techniques like cluster analysis to identify distinct patterns and relationships within the data","Technologies":"Cluster analysis tools, data visualization tools","People":"Data analysts, statisticians, economists","Owner":"Research institutions, data science teams"}]}
